column2: Watch your hair! The drill eats it very fast! Drill 8 holes into the peg.

column1: images/3, LEDs have a direction (longer leg = plus pole{,} shorter leg = minus pole).
column2: Stick the LEDs through the holes so that all long legs are on the same side.

column1: images/4, Bend all legs of the LEDs so that legs of the same length touch. Long and short legs must not touch!
column2: Solder all long and all short legs together.

column1: images/5, Remove about \SI{10}{mm} of insulation from both sides of the wires.
column2: Solder the wires to the legs.

column1: images/7, Insert a battery into the battery holder (with $+$ on the top)
column2: Hold the wires to the battery holder and look when the LEDs blink. This is the direction you need to solder.
column3: Take out the battery! Solder the battery to the wires.

column2: Glue the battery holder to the peg and reinsert the battery.
